title: 171: Wheelchair Rapunzel
itunes:title: 171: Wheelchair Rapunzel
description:
The Broads are joined by the fabulous and hilarious Alex Dacy aka Wheelchair Rapunzel! She chats with them about having SMA, growing up with a disabled body, the lack of representation for disabled bodies, the phrase “being inspiring”, inspiration porn, guys with the worst pick up lines, the need to vote, the lack of accessibility, her current celebrity crush, and much more. 
ALEX DACY AKA WHEELCHAIR RAPUNZEL:
Follow her: @wheelchair_rapunzel 
Her website: www.wheelchairrapunzel.com (http://www.wheelchairrapunzel.com/)
Check out her company: @wheelchairrapunzel.co (http://wheelchairrapunzel.co/)
Fundraiser for Alex’s wheelchair accessible van: https://gf.me/u/yfz493
Sign Petition for “Wheelchair Repair Reform”: http://chng.it/9RtcVQdw8L
THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS: 
***HISMILE: Get 20% off storewide by going to www.hismileteeth.com (http://www.hismileteeth.com/) and entering code CHATTYBROADS at checkout!
***MODERN FERTILITY: Get $20 off the test when you go to Modernfertility.com/ (http://modernfertility.com/) CHATTY. 
***GLOSSIER: All new customers will get 10% off their first order at Glossier.com/podcast/ (http://glossier.com/podcast/) chatty (certain exclusions apply)
***SKILLSHARE: Explore your creativity and get 2 free months of Premium Membership at Skillshare.com/ (http://skillshare.com/) CHATTY
***ATHENA: Get 15% off your first order at Athenaclub.com (http://athenaclub.com/) and use promo code CHATTY

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
